charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 24 months; the cost of incarceration fee is waived. Upon release from imprisonment, the Defendant shall be placed on Supervised Release for a term of 1 year with standard and special conditions. If Deported, the term of supervised release shall be unsupervised. If deported (or removed) from the United States, the Defendant shall not re-enter or attempt to re-enter the United States without the written authorization of the Secretary of Homeland Security. Mandatory drug testing waived. No fine. Defendant to pay $100.00 mandatory assessment, due immediately.

charges.charge_description: 18:1001.F - STATEMENTS OR ENTRIES GENERALLY, 18:1028A.F - FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS, 18:1544.F - MISUSE OF PASSPORT, 42:408.F - MISUSE OF SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER, 18:1028A.F - FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS
